transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji sir.
Customer: Ikram sir hi baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hain?
Executive: Sir, sir baat kar raha tha. 10,000 jama karaye.
Executive: Achcha abhi aap hi se baat ho rahi thi kya?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Achcha woh meeting ka maine link bheja hua hai aapko, toh aap join karenge is baar? Meeting meeting meeting kar lete hain join.
Executive: Aur kaise join karenge? Mobile phone se ya system se?
Customer: Laptop se kar lenge.
Executive: Laptop se hi kariye, thoda discussion, district wagera dekh lenge toh thodi badhiya ho jayega discussion halka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Toh ek baar join kariye, main guide bhi kar deta hu aapko, dikkat aaye toh line pe. Bhej diya WhatsApp pe.
Executive: WhatsApp pe group mein bheja hai maine. Hamare group bana hua hai WhatsApp ka, server mere manager hain usme.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Join kariye aap.
Customer: Bhai Imran. Ho gaya 5 minute ruko. Aye bhai Imran. 2 minute mein aa raha hu. Haan haan aa jaiye main.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants customer to join meeting.

Resolution:

- Executive sent meeting link on WhatsApp group.

- Executive offered guidance to customer for joining.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, whatsapp, link, join
